messages.title: Your Seat Counts and Every Single Vote Will Count
messages.content: If Jeremy Corbyn wins in Stockton South constituency, his position is strengthened and my bargaining position on Brexit is weakened. A vote for anyone but my candidate – James Wharton – is still a vote for Jeremy Corbyn and we will get 5 years of his coalition of chaos.

messages.title: Making Brexit a Success is Central to Our National Interest
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring Brexit is successful to secure economic stability and national interest.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Don't forget the opinion polls got the General Election wrong in 2015. They got the EU referendum wrong, and as Jeremy Corbyn has said himself, he was a 200/1 outside chance for the Labour leadership. Why risk it now with so much at stake?

issues.brexitEurope: We can get the Brexit deal right, your economic security and prosperity will be put at risk, and the opportunities you seek for your family will simply not happen.
issues.government: Strong and stable leadership will deliver the best Brexit deal for you and for Britain.

images.caption: Theresa May and James Wharton - Strong and Stable Leadership for Stockton South and for Britain
A Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn

examples: Jeremy Corbyn negotiating Brexit – which we would all pay for in higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste and more debt.
A vote for anyone but my candidate – James Wharton – is still a vote for Jeremy Corbyn and we will get 5 years of his coalition of chaos.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Back me by voting for my candidate, James Wharton, in your local constituency of Stockton South.
